{{include reference="PhenoTips.TabelarDataMacros"/}} {{velocity}} $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.FontAwesomeIcons')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.IndexVocabulary')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.IndexVocabulary')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## == $services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.heading') == (% class="two-thirds-width" %)((( {{info}}$services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.URLhint'){{/info}} {{warning}}$services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.longWaitWarning'){{/warning}} {{html wiki=false clean=false}} #foreach ($vocabularyId in $services.vocabularies.getAvailableVocabularies()) #set ($vocabulary = $services.vocabularies.get($vocabularyId)) #try() #set ($vocabularySource = $vocabulary.getSourceLocation()) #set ($vocabularyDefaultSource = $vocabulary.DefaultSourceLocation) #if ($vocabularySource && $vocabularySource != '') ## We can index this vocabulary
#set ($citation = "$vocabulary.citation") #set ($link = "$vocabulary.website") #set ($version = $vocabulary.version) #if ($version) #set ($versionText = $services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.version',[$version])) #set ($buttonText = $services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.startReindex')) #else #set ($versionText = $services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.noVersion')) #set ($buttonText = $services.localization.render('phenotips.indexVocabulary.startIndex')) #end $versionText #set($vocabularyHint = $services.localization.render("phenotips.indexVocabulary.hint.${vocabularyId}")) #if ($vocabularyHint != "phenotips.indexVocabulary.hint.${vocabularyId}") ## a hint exists $vocabularyHint #end
#if ($vocabulary.getExtensions().size() > 0) #foreach ($extension in $vocabulary.getExtensions()) #if ($extension.getName())
#end #end #end
#end #end #end #set ($displayDocumentName = 'PhenoTips.IndexVocabulary') #set ($vocabularySourceRelocationClassname = 'PhenoTips.VocabularySourceRelocationClass')
{{/html}} #__extradata_displayTable($vocabularySourceRelocationClassname, {'counter' : false, 'labels' : false, 'mode' : 'edit', 'addedDisplaySheet' : $displayDocumentName}) {{html clean="false"}}
